title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml' within the project.
3. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'.
4. Right-click and choose 'Open With...' -> 'Default Text Editor'.

The expected behavior is that a new editor should open for the file 'test.xml' because the selected editor type is different from the one currently open. However, the actual behavior is that nothing happens and the existing editor, which is the scripted resource editor example, remains active.
